nodes.text: The Schenor/Imperial treaty was an agreement between the Galactic Empire and the Schenor government. It authorized the Empire to construct a base on Rhamsis Callo, the Schenor homeworld. Following an attack on a research station operated by the Schenor, B'karitz, an important Schenor noble and nest-guildmaster, nullified the treaty and banned the Empire from their world.
